pf.matcher.implementations.functional
Class SimilarityDegree

java.lang.Object
  pf.matcher.implementations.functional.SimilarityDegree

public class SimilarityDegree
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds a request parameter and a possible similarity degree with a service parameter.

Author:
Rodrigo Almeida de Amorim
